reviewText: Bought this for the movie one mans hero. This is a great movie and I believe is based on historical facts. It seems the textbooks we used in school were more storybooks rather than actual history books.
It's my favorite movie. It's the most inspiring as the brave men fight for Texas and their heroic moments of their lives.
Way too long to get to the point.
It's one of the better movies that I have seen.  There has been 7 or 8 movies made one being a silent film which I have been able to collect and place in my library.  I really enjoyed it.
You had the actors, but not the screen play.  The Alamo story always falls into the hands of romantics who neglect the drama.  Another failed effort.
This movie was excellent in its portrayal of the ALAMO story. I highly recommend to serious history buffs and everyone else.
